title: Can I score 90+ if 4 months is left before the board exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: Surely , there is no one in the world who cannot achieve this 90+ in 4 months before the boards (Exception if you scored less than 25%, please just think about passing the examination than). But as you are asking this question , you surely are from those lot of people who are too skeptic about their capabilities , Throw all the negative thoughts out of your brain and start working . A man who thinks much does not end up doing much . Please avoid yourself in a situation where u will be asking the same question 3 months before the examination , according to one of my great teachers every delayed month in your preparation from henceforth will result in a decline of 4 percentage .

If you have to score better marks in boards in limited time period then follow some of my best tips that will helps you : Choose distraction free environment.Avoid disturbance & tempting things.Always be focused.Make an effective schedule or time-table.Give 2 hours to each subjects.Use smart way instead of hard way.Study 12 hours a day.The more you practice the more you learn.Solve 80 questions per day, that will increase your speed also.If you want to cover all your concepts with better understanding in limited time period then use OYE EXAM APP that is easily available on play store & provides you all the study materials at your finger tips. Study material such as :- Exemplars of all subjects by expert authors, Exam analytics, Question bank of up-to 8000 unique questions, Important questions, previous papers of up-to 12 years etc.etc. Hope this answer will helpful for you. THANK YOU.

Yes of course! No doubts about it. 4 months is a long period to study. Just do the following : Make a turn table.Study all subjects equally hard as it is our boards and all are important not only for ur aggregates but also for your basics.Keep studying these four months but take occasional time offs for relaxing.All is well. Happy studying! :)
